title: Just for You
overview: Can love mend all wounds? Qiao Kai Teng and Qiao Xi Ming are brothers who lead very different lives. Kai Teng gave up his dreams of becoming a national champion athlete in order to provide for his family and now works as a plumber. The younger Xi Ming was able to finish his education and became a famous lawyer. Kai Teng meets the cold and aloof Su Liang Yun, a prosecutor. Xi Ming meets Xu Bao Qi, a woman who may have the answers to his lost memories from traumatic events 10 years ago. Can these women help the brothers heal the wounds of their painful pasts?
